price: 6. Kce seehadaytow maca koo duquurussaah ku Rabbiy cinda lek?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
